titleInfo.title: Home of Isadore and Edith Bernheim

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 6 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#1048 Bernheim/Bowman Family Businesses, Pueblo, CO 1921." On photograph: "Home of Isadore & Edith Bernheim, Greenwood St., Pueblo, Co. built mid to late 20s."

mods.abstract: Exterior view of Isadore and Edith Bernheim's home on Greenwood St in Pueblo, Colorado.
